src:
Cute Duck Smiling as It Enjoys Neck Scratching
All babies sleep better after a lullaby, and this little duck from the video is no exception. We can see the cute bird getting sleepy after its owner uses some lifehacks.

04 Nov 2019, 05:54

Schubert's Lullaby and love - this is the perfect way to put your baby to bed, even if your baby is a small white duck. The duckling from the video can't resist sleeping after the owner started scratching its neck and head. We can see the little bird nuzzling against the hooman's arm, smiling and slowly closing its eyes to enter the dream world.
